name: wunxp
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: wunss(cxp(c0, c1), c2, cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1))), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1))), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cxp(c0, c1), cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1))), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(cxp(c0, c1), cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1)))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1))), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cxp(c0, c1), cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cpw(cun(c0, c1)), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cun(c0, c1), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cxp(c0, c1), cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(cun(c0, c1), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cun(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wss(cxp(c0, c1), cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1)))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(cxp(c0, c1), cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1)))))
-| wss(cxp(c0, c1), cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wss(cxp(c0, c1), cpw(cpw(cun(c0, c1))))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cwun))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

comment: A weak universe is closed under cartesian products. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
